course.title: PSY 3109 Social Motivation (3 units)
course.desc: Theories of motivation. Emotions as motives and indicators of motivational states. Self-efficacy, success expectancy, and outcome importance in motivated behaviour. Gender differences. Motivational bases of current concerns: obesity, phobias, self-handicapping, over achievement behaviours. Current research in social motivation.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2110.
